Comment 1: 
This is unrelated to functions, etc. It is purely a function of the line comment which
changes the line information and thus the positioning of the comment. For instance:

package main

const p = 3

//line file.go:2

works fine, but changing the line number to 1 will mangle the result.

A correct approach will require token.Pos(itions) to provide two kinds of position
information: The actual source code position, and the modified (//line) position, if
different.
